channel.title: Rune2006 - Relive your Adventure!
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://rune2006.com/images/logo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2rfpyqt.gif[/img] [URL=http://http://rune2006.com][b]Homepage[/b][/URL] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2rfpyqt.gif[/img] [URL=http://http://rune2006.com/forum/showthread.php?tid=356][b]Play[/b][/URL] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yzWIZ7MQm2Q[/youtube] [/CENTER]
[size=3]Welcome to the Rune2006 Advertisement Thread Rune2006 is a runescape emulation based on the 2006scape. We have an XP rate of x1. Before you post a link to oldschool runescape, let me assure you, there is still a lot of demand for our server. We hit 30 players online only 1 week after release. There are loads of reasons people would want to play our server even with 2007 runescape around the corner. Before this project I was mainly busy with my previous server. It had been running for the past 2 years and is still online. It had it's ups and down going from 20 to 150 players online. Noiw however I decided to move on to something new because I felt a lot of newcomers were looking for a pure remake. We hope you take a look around. This thread will be updated with more features along the way.
You may have seen a lot of people using 2006scape lately because a source with 2006scape as base has been released by someone. I can however assure you that unlike the other projects, I am dedicated to this. *My other server has been online for over 2 years and has never had any downtime. *We host our services on a ddos protected VPS That can sustain attacks with a high pps rate and bandwith. *The released version in the downloads section still had a lot of dupes, which were all fixed with us before their source was even released. *I am dedicated to developing content and updates and care about my community.
[B][Color=red]Please remember to register an account on the forums as our game is forum integrated![/color][/B] [/size] [center][IMG width=800 height=400]http://www.rune2006.com/images/pic1.png[/img][IMG width=800 height=400]http://www.rune2006.com/images/pic2.png[/img][/center]

item.title: Rune2006 - Relive your Adventure!
item.dc:creator: @artego artego
item.description:
@artego wrote:

Soulcist, the thread messed up because links to google got renamed to “google”. To be honest I don’t see what you dislike about the ranks.
Thanks for the feedback though
Also you are the first to actually find them bad looking. I remember how almost everyone loved them.
Also, what specific ranks do you dislike?

Read full topic

item.title: Rune2006 - Relive your Adventure!
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

Thread needs to be cleaned up, should have previewed it before posting this. And the forums are decent but once I hit a thread to view, I saw the ranks - hideous to be honest, and should PROBABLY be changed.

Read full topic

item.title: Rune2006 - Relive your Adventure!
item.dc:creator: @artego artego
item.description:
@artego wrote:

[CENTER]
Homepage
Play
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yzWIZ7MQm2Q[/youtube]
[/CENTER]

[size=3]Welcome to the Rune2006 Advertisement Thread
Rune2006 is a runescape emulation based on the 2006scape. We have an XP rate of x1. Before you post a link to oldschool runescape, let me assure you, there is still a lot of demand for our server. We hit 30 players online only 1 week after release. There are loads of reasons people would want to play our server even with 2007 runescape around the corner. Before this project I was mainly busy with my previous server. It had been running for the past 2 years and is still online. It had it’s ups and down going from 20 to 150 players online. Noiw however I decided to move on to something new because I felt a lot of newcomers were looking for a pure remake.
We hope you take a look around. This thread will be updated with more features along the way.

You may have seen a lot of people using 2006scape lately because a source with 2006scape as base has been released by someone.
I can however assure you that unlike the other projects, I am dedicated to this.
*My other server has been online for over 2 years and has never had any downtime.
*We host our services on a ddos protected VPS That can sustain attacks with a high pps rate and bandwith.
*The released version in the downloads section still had a lot of dupes, which were all fixed with us before their source was even released.
*I am dedicated to developing content and updates and care about my community.

[Color=red]Please remember to register an account on the forums as our game is forum integrated![/color]
[/size]
[center][/center]

Read full topic
